lead_paragraph: PEARL HARBOR, Hawaii, Dec. 1 -- Paying special tribute to the submarine and air arms of the Navy, which, he said, have been the "spearheads" of United States advances in the Pacific, Admiral Chester W. Nimitz, commander in chief of the Pacific Fleet, today presented awards to twenty-one officers and men at the submarine base here.
abstract: US plane carrier Wasp comdr Capt F P Sherman and Lt H H Larsen get Navy Cross
